name: Elastic
description:
This plugin is used to deliver Alerts (DLP, Malware, Policy, Compromised Credential, Malsite, Quarantine, Remediation, Security Assessment, Watchlist, UBA, CTEP) and Events (Page, Application, Audit, Infrastructure, Network, Incident, Endpoint) in ECS (Elastic Common Schema) and JSON formats to the Elastic platform. For details on Elastic Agent deployment, refer the [documentation](https://docs.elastic.co/integrations/netskope).

Note: This plugin does not support sending WebTx logs to Elastic.

configuration.label: Server Address
configuration.description: Server Address for TCP Connection. If elastic agent and Netskope CE are installed on same machine then use IP address of your machine as Server Address.
